original: Dahlström, Sven Helge Melker, civilingenjör, sektionsingenjör, Nässjö, f. 16/9/00 i Söderåkra, Kalm. 1., av Melcher A. D. o. Siri Ohlsson. — Stud:ex. i Kalm. 19, avg:ex. fr. KTH 25. Anst. v. telegr :v. fr. 26, bitr. ing. å telegr :styr. radiobyrå 26-30, ingias-sist. 30, v. telegr :verkets kabelkont. 31, H. distr. linjeavd. i Gbg 32, tetegr :-styr. linjebyrå 33-35, tf. byråing. 35, tf. linjeing. v. Gbgs landssekt. 35 o. v. Nässjö sekt. 37, sekt :ing. 38. Medl. av Sv. tekn:för. fr. 26.
translated: Dahlström, Sven Helge Melker, civil engineer, section engineer, Nässjö, b. September 16, 1900, in Söderåkra, Kalmar County, the first child of Melcher A. D. and Siri Ohlsson. He passed his studentexamen (university entrance exam) in Kalmar in 1919 and graduated from KTH (Royal Institute of Technology) in 1925. He was employed by the telegraph administration from 1926, serving as an assistant engineer at the radio bureau from 1926-1930, as an engineer at the cable office from 1930-1931, as a district line engineer in Gothenburg in 1932, at the telegraph control line bureau from 1933-1935, as temporary bureau engineer in 1935, as a temporary line engineer at the Gothenburg county section in 1935, and at the Nässjö section in 1937, where he was appointed section engineer in 1938. He has been a member of the Swedish Society of Engineers since 1926.
